#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
inline long long int input()
{
	long long int n=0,flag=0;
	char c;

	for(c=getchar_unlocked();c==' '||c=='\n'||c=='\t';c=getchar_unlocked());

	if(c=='-')
	{
		flag=1;
		c=getchar_unlocked();
	}

	for(;c>0x2f && c<0x3a;c=getchar_unlocked())
	 n=(n*10)+(c & 0x0f);

	if(flag)
	 n*=-1;

	return n;
};
int main()
{
    int t;
    //scanf("%d",&t);
    t=input();
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int m,n;
        //scanf("%d %d",&m,&n);
        m=input();
        n=input();
        if((m%2!=0) && (n%2!=0))
        {
            printf("%lld/%lld\n",(m*n)/2,(m*n));
        }
        else
        {
            printf("1/2\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
